name: ai.cerb.editor.mapBuilder
script:
start:
  await:
    form:
      title: Map Builder
      elements:
        sheet/prompt_map_resource:
          label: Resource:
          required@bool: yes
          data:
            automation:
              uri: cerb:automation:cerb.data.records
              inputs:
                record_type: resource
                #query_required@text:
                  #status:o
          limit: 5
          #default: option1
          schema:
            layout:
              headings@bool: no
              paging@bool: no
              filtering@bool: yes
              #title_column: key
            columns:
              selection/name:
                params:
                  mode: single
                  #mode: multiple
              card/_label:
                params:
                  bold@bool: yes
                  #image@bool: yes
        
        sheet/prompt_projection:
          label: Projection:
          required@bool: yes
          data:
            0:
              key: mercator
              name: Mercator
              description: Optimized for flat representation of regions
            1:
              key: naturalEarth
              name: Natural Earth
              description: Optimized for full world view
            2:
              key: albersUsa
              name: Albers (USA)
              description: Optimized for a condensed view of all 50 states
          limit: 5
          default: mercator
          schema:
            layout:
              headings@bool: no
              paging@bool: no
              #filtering@bool: yes
              #title_column: key
            columns:
              selection/key:
                params:
                  mode: single
                  #mode: multiple
              text/name:
                params:
                  bold@bool: yes
              text/description:
  return:
    snippet@text:
      map:
        resource:
          uri: cerb:automation:{{prompt_map_resource}}
        projection:
          type: {{prompt_projection}}
          scale: 90
          center:
            longitude: 0
            latitude: 0
        #regions:
        #points:
